Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of correction to report on information regarding sick call and clinic production and share such information with correctional health services, and to repeal section 9-108 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to health services for incarcerated individuals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOC to report on information regarding sick call and clinic production and share such information with correctional health services, and to repeal section 9-108 of the administrative code, relating to health services for incarcerated individ

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the grievance process for incarcerated individuals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to 311 complaints made by incarcerated individuals and informing incarcerated individuals of the protections against retaliation for filing a grievance
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: 311 complaints made by incarcerated individuals and informing incarcerated individuals of the protections against retaliation for filing a grievance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the board of correction to report on the department of correction’s grievance process
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the board of correction to conduct surveys of the correctional system’s grievance process.
